name: Windo
description:
A mini room cleaning game created during TOJAM 2022 - "That Shouldn't Be There"

Instruction:

Use the wind to clean the room!

WASD to move

QE to rotate

Left mouse click to activate your front fan

Right mouse click to use the ultimate "Watergun Blaster"

Maybe the cat cage can do something.

Special thanks to Charlotte Crosland@simetrafae who created all the SFX and an excellent BGM, and Yuan Liu for drawing the cover image.
